text: In years past Albion has sacrificed itself for the benefit of the rest of the world, siphoning the winds of magic into their very soil, poisoning and twisting the former paradise into a dangerous, bleak parody of itself. Yet the Truthsayers still guard the sacred sites of the Old Ones, biding their time to restore them.
Albion only has resources to commit to a single Waystone restoration at a time.

Let Dural Durak and his Truthsayers cower in Albion, I will take war and fury to the Runious Powers themselves! Their servants shall suffer for the defilement of Albion, and they shall never find peace iny my father's realm!
